The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/Users/carljhunloserquina/Documents/food.serviceRawFile:
# serverless.yml
org: carlserquina
app: food-cost-app
service: food-cost-api

params:
  default:
    domain: ${sls:stage}.foodcostapi.com
  prod:
    domain: foodcostapi.com
  dev:
    domain: dev.foodcostapi.com

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs22.x
  region: ap-southeast-2
  stage: dev
  deploymentBucket:
    name: food-cost-deployment-bucket-795796019955
    blockPublicAccess: true
  environment:
    DB_USERNAME: ${param:DB_USERNAME, 'foodcostadmin'}
    DB_PASSWORD: ${param:DB_PASSWORD, '562GodIsMy'}
    DB_NAME: ${param:DB_NAME, 'foodcost'}
    NODE_ENV: ${opt:stage, 'production'}
  tags:
    environment: ${sls:stage}

functions:
  foodCostLambda:
    handler: lambda.handler
    memorySize: 512
    timeout: 10
    events:
      - http:
          path: /{proxy+}
          method: ANY
          cors: true

plugins:
  - serverless-appsync-plugin

appSync:
  name: FoodCostApi
  schema: ./src/schema.graphql
  authentication:
    type: API_KEY
  dataSources:
    FoodCostLambdaDataSource:
      type: AWS_LAMBDA
      config:
        functionArn: "arn:aws:lambda:ap-southeast-2:795796019955:function:food-cost-api-dev-foodCostLambda"
  resolvers:
    Query.invoices:
      kind: UNIT # Use UNIT for direct Lambda invocation
      dataSource: FoodCostLambdaDataSource

package:
  individually: true
  exclude:
    - node_modules/**
  include:
    - lambda.js
    - resolvers.js
    - data-source.js
    - src/schema.graphql
